item.title: My Review of the Best Books I Read in 2016
item.description: I took a challenge of reading 20 books in 2016 of which I successfully completed 13 books. I mostly prefer non-fiction because they focus more on how the real world works and give me most out of the time I invest in them.

item.title: My Favourite Read From The Past - Startups, Tech. Life
item.description:
Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
-Joseph Addision

item.title: Up and running, Hell Ya!
item.description: I had previously tried to create my own blog enabled website but because of the amount of work it requires to create such site (we are talking about a well maintained backend with database and all), I couldâ€™t bring this idea in action.
